body.name: NEEWER 77 inch Camera Tripod Monopod for DSLR, Phone with 360° Panoramic Ball Head, 2 Axis Center Column, Arca Type QR Plate, Compact Aluminum Lightweight Travel Tripod 34lb Max Load, Bag Included
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 23 mins
features: UPGRADED DESIGN: The unique design of the center column consisted of 2 sections enables the maximum height of the tripod and monopod to be higher; 4 section legs with quick pull flip type locking buckle allow you to adjust the working height from 24" to 77" in seconds

360 DEGREES PANORAMA BALL HEAD: The specially designed ball head can rotate 360 degrees which will allow you to get the perfect shooting angle to create stunning panoramas every time. It has 2 independent control knobs to facilitate the adjustment of each precise angle

PRACTICAL AND ADJUSTABLE: The tripod can be folded to 19 inches compact storage size and 3.53 pounds net weight for easy carrying with bag; 3 levels of opening angle to stabilize on varying uneven grounds and incline levels; The inverted centre column can realize macro photography

TRANSFORM INTO MONOPOD: One of the tripod leg tube can be quickly disassembled and connect with the central axis to transform into a monopod, providing an alternative way of shooting with ease; The height of the monopod is adjustable from 35" to 70"

ULTRA STABLE: Tripod legs are made of finely crafted aluminum alloy; Max. load weight is 34lb/15.4kg for optimal performance; The bubble level indicator on ball head help to achieve accurate horizontal alignment and provide photographic stability. Center column is designed with a hook for sandbag to increase stability (Sandbag Not Included); This tripod can make it the best companion of your DSLR cameras and withstand heavier load compared to similar products yet remain stable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NEEWER 77"" 2 in 1 Aluminum Tripod Monopod with 360 Degree Ball Head, 2 Center Axis, QR Plate and 8 Kilograms Load NOTE: Camera is not included. Made of Aluminum Alloy with solid and durable construction.The height of the tripod is adjustable from 24-77 inches, and folded to 19 inches compact storage size and 3.53 pounds net weight for easy carrying.The specially designed ball head can rotate 360 degrees which will allow you to get the perfect shooting angle to create stunning panoramas and discover different beauty. 360 degree flexible sphere design which makes it more easy for cinema shots such as pan, tilt, and pan tilt at the same time.The 3 position angle adjustment system offers 3 alternative angles which give you the best angle and position with flexible and accurate adjustment. It allows you to shoot in narrow areas or on uneven terrain for different shooting scenarios.Inverted shooting allows you to shot static landscapes from the low angle, like lake surface and perfect for macro shooting.Non-slip rubber feet ensure that the tripod remains stable on the ground surface. Specifications: Material: Aluminum AlloyFolded Height: 19 inches/ 48 centimeter; Min. Tripod Height: 24-77 inches/ 61-197 centimeter; Max. Load Capacity: 15.4 kilogram/34 pounds; Monopod Height: 35-70 inches/89-178 centimeters; Tripod Weight: 1.6 kilogram/ 3.53 poundsSphere Diameter: 36 millimeter; Leg Section: 4; Leg Lock Type: Flip Lock Package Contents: 1x Tripod (with ball head); 1x Carrying Bag

The upgraded unique design of the center column consisted of 2 sections enables the maximum height of the tripod and monopod to be higher. QR plate with standard 1/4"" screw mount for fast camera connection and it is compatible with almost all DSLR cameras such as Canon, Nikon, Sony, Samsung, Olympus, Panasonic, Pentax and etc. The flip locks make it easier and faster to adjust the height, so you can extend or retract the tripod in seconds. With the weight hook at the bottom of the center column, you can hang extra weight for additional stability which is safer for taking pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and looks great
reviews.reviewText: I needed a tripod for my camera and this is exactly what I needed. The material is very good quality. Feels sturdy in your hands. Has a lot of adjustments at both the base as well as the angle of your camera. Just a couple of turns and you’re set to go. That being said there is a good amount of weight to it so if you want something plastic that weighs nearly nothing this is not the oneI mounted my camera and let it run overnight to capture a Timelapse in the middle of some high wind gusts and it held up perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than many cheap knockoffs
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this tripod for recording videos, and I have been extremely impressed with its performance. Neewer is a brand I had heard about before and trust.The design of the tripod is both sturdy and lightweight, making it easy to move around and set up. 77 inches is as much as you will need for basically any situation, since you want it to be at least as tall as the person you are filming.One of the standout features of this tripod is the fluid head with adjustable resistance. This allows me to make smooth, precise movements while filming, and the adjustable resistance allows me to customize the amount of resistance to my liking.Another great feature of this tripod is the ability to hang a counterweight from the center column. This provides additional stability and ensures that the tripod doesn't tip over, even when using heavy cameras on an incline.In addition to its impressive features, the tripod also comes with an excellent carrying case.One of the things that surprised me the most about this tripod is its ability to easily convert into a monopod. This is a great feature to have, as it allows me to switch between using the tripod and monopod quickly and easily.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of this tripod. It has way more features than I expected for the price, and it has proven to be a valuable tool for recording videos. I highly recommend this tripod to anyone in need of a sturdy, reliable, and versatile tripod for their filming needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Reliable and Fairly Light!
reviews.reviewText: I travel with this tripod when doing video gigs where I dont want to carry anything heavy and this does the trick really well. Best small tripod I’ve had im a while and gets really high so I can see above crowds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Except one thing
reviews.reviewText: The overall tripod itself is amazing. It’s sturdy, well built, and has a lot of options for a shoot. However, the case it came with had a very tough and broken zipper. it was so tough i had to break the zipper just to get the tripod. the case itself felt nice, but the zipper broke. that’s the only reason i give this 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use it for astrophotography and it works great very stable. I keep it low. Good quality for the price

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Made of superior quality. Great value. Perfect support with many features. Constructed of steel. Has adjustments for up and down, angle shots, includes degree, rotation, and length mismeasurements on tripod. It also can stand at angles such as non level surfaces such as rocks and ground. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Entry to mid-level tripod at a great price
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd tripod of this brand but this time I was presented with a great price on the Aluminum one. I have had the carbon fiber ones and worn them out with near daily use. I actually bought this one to swap out some parts to keep to old carbon fiber tripods in action and it worked but with some improvements. I like the center tube extension. I like the leg levers instead of the old twist locks. Also the little red leavers at the top of the legs are hooked over making them less jagged. Now the aluminum one is a still light but not as light as the carbon fiber one. Carbon fiber also dampens vibrations which is a bonus for a camera tripod which makes the aluminum one boat as great... but it is still a solid tripod. The ball head is not perfect but it locks in enough to handle modest sized jobs. I think if you expect more than what this tripod offers go to the carbon fiber one. Then the next step up would be no less than a tripod costing more than 2 times The amount of this one.

reviews.reviewTitle: NO saben lo bueno que es , hasta que lo tienes
reviews.reviewText: Tenia un tripie normal y bueno , siempre lo sentia fragil . Este nuevo tripie se siente muy seguro , material resistente y lo recomiendo al 100% Lo uso diario !

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing amazing amazing tripod for the price
reviews.reviewText: This tripod folds up so small and max extension is super tall. Taller than any other tripod I've used. I am a real estate photographer, and the ball head is very good for getting the camera levelled for all directions. The tripod is sturdy and has three adjustable leg shafts and two adjustable rods for the centre column. It also spins nicely and smoothly with everything tightened and not moving the tripod - with the 360 swivel. Incredibly happy with the purchase.I purchased this tripod and a Manfrotto one and decided to keep the way cheaper Neewer tripod as the sturdiness was comparable, the height was way taller (for exterior shots) and it was way cheaper. Highly recommend this tripod.

Non sono un professionista ma l'impressione sin dal primo uso ed al tatto/vista é di una ottima fattura, stabile non stabilissimo, io lo uso con una APS-C leggera e sono certamente soddisfatto, nella custodia é relativamente poco ingombrante, per il materiale (non carbonio ovviamente) é non troppo pesante anche se non una piuma, insomma un ottimo entry-level.
Facile à plier / deplier, très pratique pour le transportRotule très fluide, parfait pour la vidéoEt un des trépied qui va le plus haut !
